tweets.text: Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

Removing this kind of habitat during bird nesting season is appalling practice, and trying to placate us all with the ruse that ecologists will wade through thick brambles to find and protect active nests is insulting. They won‚Äôt. @kiergroup @EnvAgency https://t.co/ekGmPRyEmW

Please listen to people who know & care
 @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest https://t.co/pB76bHZ2qc

Please listen now @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @kiergroup This COULD be a fantastic project but you need to do the work at the correct time of year and NOT during the breeding season. Thanks @ChrisGPackham for the support and fingers crossed they see sense. https://t.co/En5Y1I6Rts

This country is playing a massive part in the destruction of nature
It beggars belief that you are going to sanction this @EnvAgency
This is despicable and totally unacceptable
We are seeing more examples of wanton wildlife crimes by the day and you should be protecting nature https://t.co/zj9SSrlkdN
@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Well said Chris bluddy well said!!
I‚Äôm pleased to present @EnvAgency with this award for their regulation of Walleys Landfill #StopTheStink https://t.co/WAVIJNUwyT

@scottdegg @tayz_BETH @iancollinsuk @talkRADIO @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @PHE_uk Thank you Ian Collins, it‚Äôs as bad as everyone says, please keep pushing this, so many people feel helpless, so many children are ill, we don‚Äôt know what else we can do #stopthestink

Thanks for sharing the story @itvnews Unbelievable that the @EnvAgency are allowing this environmental disaster to continue @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice https://t.co/RApRDfF12I
